name: Monday.com Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Monday.com Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Monday.com API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Monday.com API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: board

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Add Update (值: addUpdate) - Add an update to an item
Change Column Value (值: changeColumnValue) - Change a column value for a board item
Change Multiple Column Values (值: changeMultipleColumnValues) - Change multiple column values for a board item
Create (值: create) - Create an item in a board's group
Get By Column Value (值: getByColumnValue) - Get items by column value
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many items
Move (值: move) - Move item to group

boardId.name: boardId
boardId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
boardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Board Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The new item's name | (必填项)

kind.name: kind
kind.natural_language_description: 参数名: Kind | 作用: The board's kind (public / private / share) | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: columnValues (值: None) - The column values of the new item

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

columnType.name: columnType
columnType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column Type | (必填项)

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Item ID | 作用: The item's ID | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: The column value in JSON format. Documentation can be found here.
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The column value in JSON format. Documentation can be found here. | (必填项)

columnId.name: columnId
columnId.description: The column's unique identifier. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
columnId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column Name or ID | 作用: The column's unique identifier. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

columnValues.name: columnValues
columnValues.description: The column fields and values in JSON format. Documentation can be found here.
columnValues.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column Values | 作用: The column fields and values in JSON format. Documentation can be found here. | (必填项)

columnValue.name: columnValue
columnValue.description: The column value to search items by
columnValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column Value | 作用: The column value to search items by | (必填项)
